name: Godspeed
description:
Godspeed is on its way to being Greenlit!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=848920066

Enter a cold, sleepless world of cybernetics and dark space.

Its inhabitants have grown destructive, tired of the powers that created them.





You are Speed, be swift and relentless.

You are Power, strike fiercely and triumph.

You are Relief, save the captives and destroy their captors.



Depart, ascend, overcome.

Godspeed.






This circle-strafing retro shooter provides nostalgic gameplay and graphics while exploring new concepts and adding additional platforming mechanics.
